action.extra: Het begroeten van de client en je voorstellen is niet in de werkwijze is vermeld. Het is wel netjes en logisch om contact te leggen met de cliënt.

action.comment: 1. Apply hand hygiene
2. Create a clean work area and put the equipment within reach
action.extra: Maak een schoon werkveld en zet de benodigdheden binnen handbereik.
Open de katheterset en maak een steriel werkveld met steriele doek. Zorg ervoor dat je het steriele vlak tijdens het openvouwen van de steriele doek niet aanraakt.

action.comment: 4. Pour tap water from a large tap (or sterile water) over the gauze.
action.extra: Giet kraanwater uit een flink stromende kraan (of steriel water) over de wattenbollen.

action.comment: Put on gloves.
Open the outer package of the catheter a few centimeters, fold the ends. Leave the inner package in the outer package and hold the outer package with the non-dominant hand on the folded ends.
action.extra: Open de buitenverpakking van de katheter en laat de katheter in de binnenverpakking op het steriele werkveld vallen, zonder de binnenverpakking aan te raken

action.comment: Remove the end of the inner package from the catheter so that the connection point for the urine collection bag is accessible. The catheter remains in the inner package.
action.extra: Open de binnenverpakking van de katheter. De katheter blijft in binnenverpakking zitten

action.comment: With the dominant hand, grasp the tube of the urine collection bag just behind the connection point and attach it to the catheter. Continue to hold the hose.
action.extra: Verwijder de afsluitdop van de urineopvangzak en bevestig deze aan de katheter. De katheter blijft in binnenverpakking zitten
action.blockTitle: Deze handeling is nog niet mogelijk
action.blockMessage: Communiceer met de cliënt en zorg ervoor dat de cliënt klaar is voor blaaskatheterisatie

action.comment: With the non-dominant hand, remove the outer package from the catheter. Dispose of the outer packaging in the waste bin.
action.extra: Open de binnenverpakking van de katheter. De katheter blijft in binnenverpakking zitten

action.comment: Tear open the inner package along the perforation with your free hand, without touching the insert of the catheter.
Place the insertable part of the catheter on the sterile work field.
3. Open package of the syringe with 10 ml of sterile water. Leave the syringe in the package
action.extra: Open de verpakking van de spuit met 10 ml steriel water. Laat de spuit in de verpakking

action.comment: 8. Open the packaging of the syringe with lubricant, leave the syringe in the packaging.
action.extra: Open de verpakking van de spuit met glijmiddel. Laat de spuit nog in de verpakking

action.comment: 5. Ask the client to uncover the lower body and lie on the back with the legs spread apart and the knees raised.
action.extra: Vraag de cliënt het onderlichaam te ontbloten en op de rug te gaan liggen met de benen gespreid en de knieën opgetrokken

action.comment: 6. Place a pad under the buttocks and thighs of the cliënt.
action.extra: Leg een onderlegger onder de billen en dijen van de cliënt

action.comment: Remove the fixation material on the abdomen
Observe the catheter insertion site for redness and irritation and note the location of the catheter and the angle at which it is inserted.
Place the empty syringe on the balloon filler channel.
Do not apply suction but allow the syringe to fill itself.
Check whether the amount of liquid sucked in corresponds to the amount injected.
Pull the catheter gently to see if it is loose.
Remove the catheter and cover the insertion opening.
Ask the client to breathe in and out slowly and remove the catheter during the exhalation with a circular motion in the vertical direction. Leakage from the fistula is normal
Cover the insertion opening with a gauze. Some leakage is normal.
Check the catheter tip for deposits / crusting.
Discard the catheter in the waste bin
Clean the insertion area and the area with squeezed gauze pads. Dry the skin with gauze.
First squeeze each gauze above the tray.
Clean from the center (the fistula opening) to the outside. Always make one stroke per gauze.
Dry the skin with a new, dry gauze.
Throw the used gauzes in the waste bin.
Disinfect the skin around the insertion site with an alcohol gauze, and let it dry. Make sure there is no disinfectant in the fistula
Remove the lubricant syringe from the opened package, spray 5-10 ml of lubricant into the fistula opening. Cover the fistula opening with a sterile gauze
Take gloves off and throw them in the waste bin.
Apply hand hygiene
Put on sterile gloves.

Insert the catheter. (Extra info ipad: Make sure that the part to be inserted remains sterile. Insert the catheter sufficiently far so that the balloon is not in the fistula. Continue to hold the catheter.):
Insert the catheter vertically:
Move the catheter up until you see urine running out.
When the urine starts running, move the catheter about 5 cm further into the bladder to ensure that the balloon is not in the fistula channal.
Slowly fill the catheter balloon with the prescribed amount of fluid from the syringe.
Place the syringe of prescribed fluid on the balloon filling channel
Inject the prescribed amount into the catheter balloon
Remove the syringe
Carefully pull the catheter back slightly until resistance is felt
Fix the catheter with fixation material on the abdomen and thigh and ensure that it is not under tension or can buckle
Arrange the catheter in a slight curve
Fix the catheter on the abdomen with a plaster / tape
Bring the catheter towards the femur with a slight curve
Fix the catheter with the fixation material on the thigh. Ensure that the catheter and the delivery tube cannot pinch anywhere.
Check that the catheter is not under tension or that no pulling force is applied during movement
Attach the urine collection bag to the leg or suspension rack
Check that the urine collection bag is below the level of the bladder and does not touch the floor of the caregivers' feet
Take gloves off and throw them in the waste bin.

Create a clean workfield
